page.description: The {DOCKABLE} command is used in an Xdialog to turn the modeless xdialog into a dockable toolbar. It can only be used if the xdialog is modeless. i.e. if you use the UI_MODELESS_DLG_BOX()command.

argument.name: Direction
argument.description: Character. The side of the toolbar that can be docked. The toolbar is initially docked on the specified side. Allowable values are: "Left" "Right" "Bottom" "Top" (default) "Float"= initially undocked but dockable.

section.title: Example
section.example: ui_modeless_dlg_box("toolbar",<<%dlg% {background=White} {dockable=float} <%B=T%Hello> <%B=T%Goodbye!close> %dlg%,<<%Code% if a_dlg_button = "close" then ui_modeless_dlg_close("toolbar") end if %code%)
